languages.text:
"Тяжко изранен был в схватке Ульфар,
Но повалил он могучего зверя и грозно
Спросил, взявши за горло его искалеченной дланью:
"Кто в смерти братьев моих виноват?
Отвечай, злобный дух!"

"Ulfar was grievously wounded,
but the mighty beast he slew,
and asked it with menace,
his mangled hand
the beast's throat gripping—
'Who is to blame
for the deaths of my brothers?
Answer me, fell spirit!'"
languages.original_text:
"Тяжко изранен был в схватке Ульфар,
Но повалил он могучего зверя и грозно
Спросил, взявши за горло его искалеченной дланью:

Отвечай, злобный дух!"

languages.text:
「ウルファーは重傷を負ったが
彼は強き獣を倒した
彼は威嚇しながら
傷ついた手で
獣ののどを掴み、尋ねた…
『兄弟たちの死は
誰の仕業だ？
答えろ、堕落した精霊め！』」
languages.original_text:
"Ulfar was grievously wounded,
but the mighty beast he slew,
and asked it with menace,
his mangled hand
the beast's throat gripping—
'Who is to blame
for the deaths of my brothers?
Answer me, fell spirit!'"

traits.locale_text:
「ウルファーは重傷を負ったが
彼は強き獣を倒した
彼は威嚇しながら
傷ついた手で
獣ののどを掴み、尋ねた…
『兄弟たちの死は
誰の仕業だ？
答えろ、堕落した精霊め！』」

languages.text:
“乌尔法身负重伤，
但他的敌人更已命在旦夕。
他一手捏住
野兽的喉咙，
以隐然的怒气质问道——
‘究竟是谁，
杀死了我的兄弟们？
回答我，堕落的邪灵！’”
languages.original_text:
"Ulfar was grievously wounded,
but the mighty beast he slew,
and asked it with menace,
his mangled hand
the beast's throat gripping—
'Who is to blame
for the deaths of my brothers?
Answer me, fell spirit!'"

traits.locale_text:
“乌尔法身负重伤，

他一手捏住

以隐然的怒气质问道——
‘究竟是谁，
杀死了我的兄弟们？
回答我，堕落的邪灵！’”

languages.text:
« Bien que grièvement blessé
par la bête gisant à ses pieds,
Ulfar lui demanda d'une voix menaçante
en la serrant à la gorge
de sa main mutilée :
"Qui donc est responsable
de la mort de mes frères ?
Réponds-moi, esprit maléfique !" »
languages.original_text:
"Ulfar was grievously wounded,
but the mighty beast he slew,
and asked it with menace,
his mangled hand
the beast's throat gripping—
'Who is to blame
for the deaths of my brothers?
Answer me, fell spirit!'"

traits.locale_text:

de sa main mutilée :
"Qui donc est responsable
de la mort de mes frères ?
Réponds-moi, esprit maléfique !" »

languages.text:
«Ulfar sufrió graves heridas,
pero a la poderosa bestia derrotó,
y con amenaza preguntó,
su mano destrozada
a la garganta de la bestia aferrada:
"¿Quién es responsable
por las muertes de mis hermanos?
¡Responde, espíritu deleznable!"».
languages.original_text:
"Ulfar was grievously wounded,
but the mighty beast he slew,
and asked it with menace,
his mangled hand
the beast's throat gripping—
'Who is to blame
for the deaths of my brothers?
Answer me, fell spirit!'"

"¿Quién es responsable
por las muertes de mis hermanos?
¡Responde, espíritu deleznable!"».

languages.text:
"Schwer verwundet wurde Ulfar,
doch das mächtige Untier er tötete,
und fragte es zornig,
die verstümmelte Hand
die Kehle des Untiers umklammernd:
'Wer hat Schuld
am Tod meiner Brüder?
Antwortet mir, böser Geist!'"
languages.original_text:
"Ulfar was grievously wounded,
but the mighty beast he slew,
and asked it with menace,
his mangled hand
the beast's throat gripping—
'Who is to blame
for the deaths of my brothers?
Answer me, fell spirit!'"

languages.text:
"Ulfar, ağır yaralıydı
Ama yüce canavarı yenmişti.
Sordu öfkeyle,
Canavarın boğazını kavramış
Ezik eli...
'Kardeşlerimin ölümü için
Kimi suçlayayım ben?
Cevap ver bana zalim ruh!'"
languages.original_text:
"Ulfar was grievously wounded,
but the mighty beast he slew,
and asked it with menace,
his mangled hand
the beast's throat gripping—
'Who is to blame
for the deaths of my brothers?
Answer me, fell spirit!'"

traits.locale_text:
"Ulfar ağır yaralıydı
ama yüce canavarı yenmişti.
Sordu öfkeyle
ezik eli,
canavarın boğazını kavrarken
'Kimi suçlayayım
kardeşlerimin ölümü için?
Cevap ver bana zalim ruh!'
